sql.if: and ( omt.NAME like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.TRAINING_TYPE like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.ADAPT_OBJECT like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.ADDRESS like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.TRAINING_WAY like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.BRIEF like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.ANNOUNCEMENTS like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.CONTACT like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.PHONE like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.MOBILE like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') or omt.EMAIL like CONCAT('%', #{like_keyWord}, '%') )

delete from omt using (os_meeting_training as omt)
mapper.update:
update os_meeting_training
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRAINING_TYPE = #{trainingType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADAPT_OBJECT = #{adaptObject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRATION_TIME = #{registrationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REGISTRATION_DEADLINE = #{registrationDeadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRAINING_START_TIME = #{trainingStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRAINING_END_TIME = #{trainingEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGISTRATION_WAY = #{registrationWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_PLAYERS = #{maxPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TRAINING_WAY = #{trainingWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVIEW_FILE_ID = #{previewFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PREVIEW_FILE_NAME = #{previewFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRIEF = #{brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRIEF_FILE_ID = #{briefFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRIEF_FILE_NAME = #{briefFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNOUNCEMENTS = #{announcements,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNO_FILE_ID = #{annoFileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANNO_FILE_NAME = #{annoFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SORT_INDEX = #{sortIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IS_VISIBLE = #{isVisible,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TRAINING_ID = #{trainingId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
